Row.Text: Nature Reserve

A district in your city for nature conservation. Includes adjacent tiles into Nature Reserve, on which improvements cannot be built and citizens cannot work. Bonus to [ICON_Science] Science from adjacent terrains, features and natural wonders. This district does not require population and is not a specialty district.
Landscape Area

A district in your city for sightseeing tourism. Includes adjacent tiles into Landscape Area. Bonus [ICON_Culture] Culture and [ICON_Gold] Gold to adjacent improved tiles equal to 50% of the tile's Appeal. Bonus [ICON_Tourism] Tourism to adjacent unimproved tiles equal to 100% of the tile's Appeal. This district does not require population and is not a specialty district.
